actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue coins in commemoration of the 125th Anniversary of Yellowstone National Park.
short_title: Yellowstone National Park 125th Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act

summary.text: Yellowstone National Park 125th Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act - Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue not more than 500,000 one-dollar silver coins to commemorate the 125th Anniversary of Yellowstone National Park. Mandates that the design for the coins shall be: (1) selected by the Secretary after consultation with the United States Commission of Fine Arts; and (2) reviewed by the Citizens Commemorative Coin Advisory Committee. Mandates that 50 percent of coin sale surcharges be used for Yellowstone National Park and 50 percent for the National Park Service Foundation.

titles.title: Yellowstone National Park 125th Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act
A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue coins in commemoration of the 125th Anniversary of Yellowstone National Park.
